page.title: 01Summary Of Our Area.
page.content: Area Ref.No 0396 0648 lies South West of Berwick-upon Tweed. Rural Area, relatively flat. Highest points- Billylaw (l08m above sea level) Murton High Crags (90m above sea level.) Roads-Berwick By Pass A1(T) A698 B6354 Flora/Fauna-Typical of N.N'berland. Several small coniferous woods. Agriculture- 7 farms (arable and mixed farming.) 1 dairy farm. Some field boundaries marked by dry_stone walls. Farmhouses/cottages built with sandstone quarried locally. Lge.houses-Ordhill, Murton White House Urban Expansion-Robert's Lodge Housing Estate. Private development of luxury houses at Longridge Towers. Specialist features relating to water supply of Berwick/Tweed-Murton Borehole/Springhill Reservoir.
